article: new york mayor michael bloomberg visited survivors of a palestinian suicide bombing tuesday , saying that americans and israelis alike had to `` stand up and fight back '' against terrorism .
abstract: new york mayor urges israelis to fight back after visiting victims of jerusalem suicide bomb
